title: Depression: A Different Approach
description: Understanding and working with depression from an integrative, embodied perspective

modules.title: Depression as Signal
modules.description: What depression might be trying to tell you

modules.title: Sustainable Wellbeing
modules.description: Building a life that supports mental health

questions.question: What is behavioral activation?
options: Taking action according to values regardless of mood
Avoiding activities until you feel better
Only doing things that feel enjoyable

questions.question: How does the body relate to depression?
options: Body symptoms are unrelated to mood

questions.question: What role does meaning play in depression?
options: Lack of meaning can contribute to depression
Meaning only matters after depression is gone

subtitle: Beyond symptoms to the roots of healing
